description: This file defines a React functional component named ConfluencePanel that displays a list of Confluence pages with their metadata, including title, space, last updated date, and updater. It includes UI elements like buttons and icons, with mock data as placeholder for actual API integration.

classes.name: ConfluencePage
classes.description: TypeScript interface defining the structure of a Confluence page object, including id, title, space, lastUpdated, and updatedBy.

methods.name: ConfluencePanel
methods.description: React functional component that renders UI for displaying a list of Confluence pages using mock data. Manages state with useState hook.
